channel.title: untracked on MyNotes
channel.description: Recent content in untracked on MyNotes

item.title: git tips
item.description: To list untracked files git ls-files --others --exclude-standard If you need to pipe the output to xargs, it is wise to mind white spaces using git ls-files -z and xargs -0: git ls-files -z -o --exclude-standard | xargs -0 git add Nice alias for adding untracked files: au = !git add $(git ls-files -o --exclude-standard) Delete untracked files: git clean -dfx
